title.rendered: Summer Jobs Program Employs Over 100 Students

content.rendered:
This year marks yet another major milestone for LAWS. Mirroring what we teach our students, we set a lofty goal, and boldly achieved it! July and August saw a record 110 students from across the GTA gainfully employed in our Summer Job Program.

The SJP provides LAWS students with engaging and inspiring early work experiences by exposing them to professional workplaces and introducing them to positive role models. Placements are four weeks and take place in July or August, with students taking on mainly administrative roles.

 

LAWS administers all aspects of the application and placement process, provides student orientation and training, and works closely with employers during placements to ensure that the SJP is rewarding and successful for everyone. It is a tremendous opportunity for employees and employers alike.

Congratulations to this year’s SJP cohort.
